title: Printed Blue Hoodie
description: Our premium Printed Blue Hoodie combines urban style with ultimate comfort. Featuring a unique graphic print, this hoodie is crafted from heavyweight cotton blend fabric for a cozy feel. The relaxed fit and kangaroo pocket make it perfect for everyday wear.

tabs.details:
Fabric: Premium heavyweight cotton blend (80% cotton, 20% polyester) for durability and comfort.
Fit: Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders for a modern silhouette.
Features: Adjustable drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, ribbed cuffs and hem.
Print: Screen-printed graphic on front, designed to last through multiple washes.
Care: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low. Do not bleach.
tabs.shipping:
Standard Shipping: 3-5 business days - $5.99 (Free on orders over $100)
Express Shipping: 2-3 business days - $12.99
International Shipping: Available to most countries - rates calculated at checkout
All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. You will receive a tracking number once your order ships.
tabs.returns:
We offer free returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition with all tags attached.
To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team with your order number. You will receive a prepaid return label via email.
Refunds will be processed within 3-5 business days after we receive your return.

title: Relaxed Fit Hoodie

tabs.returns: Free returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be in original condition with tags attached.
